discourse_list.title: CU Budget Reduction Initiatives - Wiki Summary

content.content: Intro Recently there has been heated and sustained discussion about budgeting, cost-cutting and ‘bear-proofing’ the DAO. This post is meant to serve as a starting point for those that are out of the loop, and an reference index for those deep into the issue. I’ve made this post a wiki post, meaning it is freely editable by users with trust level 3 or above. I’m less a part of the loop than I have been previously, so please help keep this up to date if you’re finding it useful.  Global Initiatives / Discussions Strategic Finance - Proactive Cash Management Strategic Finance - DAO Targets for Financial Resilience Signal JustinCase - Rethinking Budgeting for CUs Doo Wan Nam - Voluntary Budget Adjustment for 1 year Guarantees Poll  Local Initiatives     Core Unit Name Core Unit Code Offboarding Proposals Budget Reduction Proposals      Real World Finance RWF-001 - -    Risk RISK-001 - -    GovAlpha GOV-001 - -    Protocol Engineering PE-001 - -    Growth GRO-001 - -    Sustainable Ecosystem Scaling SES-001 - -    Oracles ORA-001 - Reduction (ORA)    Governance Communnications COM-001 - -    DAI Foundation DAIF-001 - Reduction (DAIF)    Starknet Engineering SNE-001 - -    Collateral Engineering Services CES-001 - -    Development and UX DUX-001 - -    Strategic Happiness SH-001 Offboarding (Codeknight) -    Data Insights DIN-001 - -    Deco Fixed-Rate DECO-001 - -    Immunefi Security IS-001 Offboarding (Ippy) -    Sidestream Auction Services SAS-001 - -    Strategic Finance SF-001 - -    TechOps TECH-001 - -    Events EVENTS-001 Offboarding (Ippy) Budget Reduction Strategy (EVENTS-001)
content.GPT-summary: The post is a wiki summary of budget reduction initiatives for the DAO, with a list of global and local initiatives and core unit names. The author explains the purpose of the post and invites users to edit it. The post may be audited and reviewed by third parties, and constructive criticism is welcome.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal

content.content: This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
